Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name:
      operator:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0097
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error if CMTRT was not collected on CRF
Outcome:
  Message: CMTRT was not collected on CRF
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0097
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Verbatim medication name that is either pre-printed
                  or collected on a CRF.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 6.1.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CM

json.Description: Trigger error if CMTRT was not collected on CRF

Outcome.Message: CMTRT was not collected on CRF

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Verbatim medication name that is either pre-printed or collected on a CRF.
